amendment.description: To make applicable provisions of law requiring the use of privately owned United States flag commercial vessels for the transportation of U.S. Aid and other materials.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 504 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 504 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S4775-4776, S4777-4781, S4805-4806; text: CR S4775-4776) To make applicable provisions of law requiring the use of privately owned United States flag commercial vessels for the transportation of U.S. Aid and other materials.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 504 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
